network.param.modules.attachments

Interface IAttachmentManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AttachmentManagerUpload

    public interface IAttachmentManager
    Perform upload file into ParamNetwork.

    IAttachmentManager upload attachments/files like photo's, PDF, XLS, etc.., to ParamNetwork. Want to perform any file upload need to implement this interface IAttachment interface.

    IAttachmentManager defines below categories of operations:

    • Upload list of files uploadAttachments to ParamNetwork.

    • Encrypt file using encryption key for a given attachment encryptAttachment

    • Download attachment from ParamNetwork downloadAttachment.

    • Upload encrypted attachment to ParamNetwork encryptAndUploadAttachment

    • download attachment and decrypt the file downloadAndDecryptAttachment

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jitendra Kumar Balla, ParamNetwork

    • Method Detail

      • uploadAttachments

        void uploadAttachments(java.util.List<IAttachment> attachments)
                throws AccessDeniedException,
                       NetworkException
        Upload attachments to ParamNetwork.

        Method will upload all the attachments to ParamNetwork.

        Parameters:
        attachments - list of attachments to be upload
        Throws:
        AccessDeniedException - unable to access privatekey and files.
        NetworkException - if sdk is unable to access the network, then it will throw NetworkException

      • encryptAttachment

        java.nio.ByteBuffer encryptAttachment(java.lang.String encryptionKey,
                                      IAttachment attachment)
                               throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                      java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
        Encrypt file using encryption key for a given attachment

        Encrypt the an attachment for a given key, and it will return encrypted content as a ByteBuffer.

        Parameters:
        attachment - steam/content need to upload to the network.
        encryptionKey - Key for encrypting the file
        Returns:
        ByteBuffer
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException

      • downloadAttachment

        IAttachment downloadAttachment(java.lang.String attachmentID)
                        throws FileNotFoundException,
                               AccessDeniedException,
                               NetworkException
        Download file using for a given attachment ID.

        Method will download attachment for a given attachment ID, if attachment is exists and user has access rights. Otherwise it will throw an error.

        Parameters:
        attachmentID - steam/content need to upload to the network.
        Returns:
        IAttachment attachment info
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - Attachment not exists for a attachmentID
        AccessDeniedException - unable to access privatekey and files.
        NetworkException - if sdk is unable to access the network, then it will throw NetworkException

      • encryptAndUploadAttachment

        void encryptAndUploadAttachment(java.lang.String encryptionKey,
                                IAttachment attachment)
                         throws AccessDeniedException,
                                NetworkException
        Encrypting and upload the file.

        Encrypt the an attachment for a given key, after encryption is successful it will upload file to the ParamNetwork.

        Parameters:
        encryptionKey - Key for encrypting the file
        attachment - steam/content need to upload to the network.
        Throws:
        AccessDeniedException - unable to access IAttachment content.
        NetworkException - if sdk is unable to access the network, then it will throw NetworkException

      • downloadAndDecryptAttachment

        IAttachment downloadAndDecryptAttachment(java.lang.String decryptionKey,
                                         java.lang.String attachmentID)
                                  throws FileNotFoundException,
                                         AccessDeniedException,
                                         NetworkException
        Decrypt and download the file.

        Encrypt the an attachment for a given key, after encryption is successful it will upload file to the ParamNetwork.

        Parameters:
        decryptionKey - Key for encrypting the file
        attachmentID - Attachment ID for downloading the file.
        Returns:
        IAttachment Attachment Info
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - unable to find the file for a given attachment ID, then it will throw FileNotFoundException
        AccessDeniedException - unable to access IAttachment content.
        NetworkException - if sdk is unable to access the network, then it will throw NetworkException
